subject: Football
Cruelty to Animals
Athletics and Sports
Animals
lead_paragraph: Animal rights activists demonstrated in front of the the league’s headquarters, as the N.F.L. grappled with the fallout from Michael Vick’s federal indictment on charges related to dogfighting.
